name: University of Michigan â€“ Ann Arbor

courses.name: Compiler Construction
courses.description: We developed a compiler over the semester to go from a high-level, functional programming language to SSA, and then to Assembly. Conceptually heavy at times, but a really fun and interesting class that has furthered my interest in this field.

courses.name: Web Systems
courses.description: The first half was familiar to me, but I still learned some new things. I took a lot of interest in distributed systems in the second half, and have since wanted to explore this area more.

courses.name: Game Design and Development
courses.description: An infinite time sink during an already busy semester, but a rewarding and fun class. I did a lot of programming, as well as work with shaders and art!

courses.name: Foundations of Computer Science
courses.description: I really enjoyed the content of this class, especially algorithms and reducations, but the class was nevertheless quite challenging for me.
